tasks.task: Farming and agricultural practices related to rice cultivation in Cambodia.
subtasks: Understand local rice varieties and their characteristics.
Compare traditional Cambodian rice varieties to new IRRI-developed CA15 variety.
Analyze the advantages of CA15 variety (drought tolerance, short duration, multiple harvests).
Explain the impact of CA15 on regional food security (increased yields, export potential).
Discuss the economic benefits for farmers (income increase, reduced poverty).
Highlight the role of international agricultural research in enhancing local farming practices.
Recognize the importance of environmental factors (water conservation) in sustainable farming.
Identify the benefits for women farmers (55% income increase).
Advocate for initiatives that support women in agriculture.
